text1: "Alternative" and "complementary" medicine is as profit-driven as traditional Western medicine.
text2: Something that is profit-driven is likely to be more effective given that there is the incentive of profit.

text1: Profit driven corporations have an incentive to create medicines and procedures that are effective.
text2: Western medicine is dominated by profit driven corporations.

text1: Alternative medicine can have health hazards.
text2: Alternative treatment encompasses the wisdom of entire civilizations overlooked by traditional medicine.
